page.title: 03HOME AND FAMILY BY ROBERT B.
page.content: I HAVE ONE BROTHER AND ONE SISTER.MY BROTHER MICHAEL IS 7 YEARS OLD AND CAN BE A RIGHT PAIN AT TIMES!MY SISTER LIZZIE IS 12 YEARS OLD.HER BEDROOM IS INCREDIBLY UNTIDY.WE HAVE A RABBIT AND FOUR GUINEA PIGS.WE ALSO HAVE TWO CATS AND CHICKENS. WE HAVE HUTCHES FOR THE ANIMALS WHEN IT'S COLD AND RUNS FOR THEM IN THE SUMMER.MY DAD WORKS FOR AN OIL COMPANY CALLED PHILLIPS 66.HE TRAVELS ALL OVER THE WORLD TO COUNTRIES LIKE DENMARK EGYPT AND THE SUDAN.THIS MEANS HE IS AWAY FROM HOME QUITE A BIT.MY MUM IS A DRAMA TEACHER AND RUNS A DRAMA CLASS IN DOVERCOURT WHICH I AND SOME OF THE OTHER CHILDREN GO TO.IN MY BEDROOM I HAVE A BIG CASTLE FOR MY LEGO KNIGHTS.(I HAVE 42 OF THEM).I HAVE LOTS OF POSTERS WHICH I COLLECT.I HAVE A CABIN BED IN MY BEDROOM WITH A STORE CUPBOARD UNDERNEATH AND A LADDER TO CLAMBER UP.
